content.raw:
We're in the process of breaking some of the Gazebo libraries into separate packages, the ignition libraries. The process is almost complete with ign-math, and we're taking the first steps with ign-transport. Eventually all Gazebo transport and messages will be deprecated.

I'll try to implement something quickly here and make a pull request to your repo, if that's ok. We think it might be more efficient if `physics::World` handles all requests for plugin info on the server. Thanks to the way you made the requests use URI, that should be easy to integrate. I'll try to have a PR for you to take a look by the end of the day, and then you can pick up from there ;)
content.html:
We're in the process of breaking some of the Gazebo libraries into separate packages, the ignition libraries. The process is almost complete with ign-math, and we're taking the first steps with ign-transport. Eventually all Gazebo transport and messages will be deprecated.

I'll try to implement something quickly here and make a pull request to your repo, if that's ok. We think it might be more efficient if physics::World handles all requests for plugin info on the server. Thanks to the way you made the requests use URI, that should be easy to integrate. I'll try to have a PR for you to take a look by the end of the day, and then you can pick up from there ;)
